0 comments Sonic Drive-In Calorie&Nutrition Info Wednesday, August 11, 2010 @ 04:08 PM posted by admin Sonic Drive-In’s web site has a few ways to get to calorie and nutrition info for their foods. However, some of the methods to get to the information are not totally obvious.
1) Sonic Menu: When you click on MENU on the top of the page at the Sonic web site a small menu is displayed, when you click on the menu it is enlarged, and if you click again on a specific item full nutrition info for that item is displayed as well as suggestions for side orders. 2) Sonic’s Nutrition Calculator : This online tool lets you select a variety of menu items to create a meal. The total nutrition and caloric information is then provided to you. This is a helpful tool as it allow you to remove elements of each item to adjust the nutrition totals (i.e. remove condiments, bread, etc.). 3) Downloadable Nutrition Guide : A printable listing of all menu items and nutrition info. 4) Sodium Intake Guide : For those restricting their sodium intake this short information sheet will help with correct choices. 5) Allergen Table : This sheet will show those with food allergies what foods to avoid. Includes allergy information for milk, egg, fish, shellfish, wheat, gluten, soy, peanut, and tree nuts. 0 comments ©2010 SquareMenu.com Entries (RSS) and Comments (RSS)
